original_title: ICA opens in WTC, offering novel education tools
original_body_lines: The International Center for Academics (ICA) opening a new chapter in the local education sector commenced providing total online education for students.

“We have observed that there is a demand for total online education for students and ICA going beyond traditional learning, came up with this innovative educational concept of providing education online,” said founder ICA, Damitha Wickramsignhe,

He is also the former Chairman of the Vocational Training Authority and Chairman of the National Youth Services Council and plays a key role in instrumenting ICA’s commitment to holistic student development.
“With a strong commitment of nurturing crucial soft skills in its students, ICA prepares them to succeed for the demands in a rapidly evolving professional world.”

“We have also affiliated with the esteemed IIC University of Technology in Cambodia which is recognized by the University Grants Commission (UGC) and the International Association of Universities (IAU),” said Chairman CEO, Dr. Manjula Fernando.

Chairman Fernando, is an experienced domain name investor and business consultant specializing in education ventures, provides visionary insights that keep ICA at the forefront of educational excellence.

“ICA’s exceptional team, consisting of professors, academic experts, and industry professionals, works collaboratively to shape a brighter future through education,” said Head of Academics, Dr. Nihal Hewage, Dr. Hewage, Head of Academics, contributes his extensive experience as a senior lecturer at Colombo University and former Secretary General of the JR Jayewardene Center to maintain high educational standards at ICA.
